bibl.title: A Greek Horoscope From 373 A.D.
bibl.note: Wooden board found in House '3' at Ismant-al-Kharab. The other side contains a Coptic text (to be published separately by I. GARDNER and A. ALCOCK). For internal reasons the Greek text was previously labelled 'T. Kellis II.A'.
bibl.seg: DE JONG T. and K.A. WORP, A Greek Horoscope From 373 A.D.
ZPE 106 (1995) pp. 235-240, 1 tabl. et pl. XI.

Wooden board found in House '3' at Ismant-al-Kharab. The other side contains a Coptic text (to be published separately by I. GARDNER and A. ALCOCK). For internal reasons the Greek text was previously labelled 'T. Kellis II.A'.
